about_the_game:
Hidden Oddities is a cosy hidden object game where you search in the nook and crannies across lush miniature landscapes, it's amazing what you might find in some of the oddest of places.

A list of items shows you what you're look at, hover over them for a closer look, and find enough to progress to the next location.

As this game is currently in development so please keep in mind that not everything you see is the final and is subject to changes.

Game Features so far

Over 20 Levels and counting

Over 87+ items to find

Non intrusive background music to relax to

Charming gameplay with interactive elements

Great for all ages!
